alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:07PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Graham and east central Pinal Counties through 745 PM MST... At 705 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness, or 22 miles east of Christmas, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aravaipa Canyon Wilderness. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford
